SNV

Displaying alleles in the specified range.

  • sample

    TSE000086, LC2/ad required

    Example name or ID

  • chromosome

    1 required

    Chromosome number

  • range_start

    10000 required

    The start of the range

  • range_end

    11000 required

    The end of the range

<togostanza-snv sample="LC2/ad" chromosome="1" range_start="10000" range_end="11000"></togostanza-snv>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
